data.eml:eml: A new species of the coral associated barnacle (Thoracica: Pyrgomatidae: Pyrgoma) from a deep-sea oculinid coral in New Caledonian waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Kim, Hyun Kyong, Chan, Benny K. K., Corbari, Laure, Rodriguez Moreno, Paula A., Achituv, Yair, Kim, Won (2019): A new species of the coral associated barnacle (Thoracica: Pyrgomatidae: Pyrgoma) from a deep-sea oculinid coral in New Caledonian waters. Zootaxa 4695 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4695.1.2
